channel.title: Windows HL Sound Pack
channel.description:
I got bored today and created a sound pack for Windows using only Half-Life sounds. So, if you like it, I may add more, if not.. I don't care :stuck_out_tongue:
The files are labeled as the windows sounds they replace.
And in case you're insanely clueless, you change Windows sounds by going to Control Panel/Hardware and Sound/Change System Sounds.
[url]https://cazzaserver.com/misc/HLsoundpack.zip[/url]
